input.sentences: it was going to be a rough game !
as he slapped the puck across the ice he thought `` i sure hope this stays away from the other team ''
unfortunately | he hit the puck directly to the enemy .
they were able to keep the puck away .
output.sentences: Many of you know, I'm kind of passionate about Hockey. Well, tonight's game was WILD.
The enemy team wasn't giving up and I was worried my favorite team would lose.
But luckily it didn't go down like that. The defense was TIGHT.
And the goalie wasn't letting the puck through for the enemies.
In the end, the score was unevenly matched. Our team won!
